check.name: Resource Distribution
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Resource Distribution concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept ResourceDistribution is present."
if(ResourceDistribution is not None and len(str(ResourceDistribution)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "ResourceDistribution concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: ResourceDistribution
selector.xpath: (/eml/*/distribution) or (/MD_Metadata/distributionInfo/MD_Distribution/distributor/MD_Distributor/distributorTransferOptions/MD_DigitalTransferOptions/onLine/CI_OnlineResource[normalize-space\(function/CI_OnLineFunctionCode)='information']) or (/MD_Metadata/distributionInfo/MD_Distribution/transferOptions/MD_DigitalTransferOptions/onLine/CI_OnlineResource[normalize-space\(function/CI_OnLineFunctionCode)='information']) or (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/citation/CI_Citation/onlineResource/CI_OnlineResource[normalize-space\(function/CI_OnLineFunctionCode)='information']) or (/MD_Metadata/distributionInfo/MD_Distribution/distributor/MD_Distributor/distributorTransferOptions/MD_DigitalTransferOptions/onLine/CI_OnlineResource[normalize-space\(function/CI_OnLineFunctionCode)='download']) or (/MD_Metadata/distributionInfo/MD_Distribution/transferOptions/MD_DigitalTransferOptions/onLine/CI_OnlineResource[normalize-space\(function/CI_OnLineFunctionCode)='download']) or (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/citation/CI_Citation/onlineResource/CI_OnlineResource[normalize-space\(function/CI_OnLineFunctionCode)='download'])

dialect.name: Dryad Data Package and Data File Modules
ISO 19115 and ISO 19115-2 / ISO 19139 and ISO 19139-2
